title: Can the sting of "inverse zombies " make you feel allergic to red meat?
subtitle: The vial of the only star can transmit a disease with symptoms similar to Lyme's, as well as a substance that can cause allergies to red meat.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A rare strain of apes called the only star monkey habit can cause itching, stomach cramps, breathing difficulties, and a sensitive reaction to red meat.
